name: Worland - No Chance of Survival
description:
Hello dear players!
I brought you a prototype, which could become anything. The basic idea is a survival game where you have to hunt for food, in the future build a base where you can garden, keep animals, etc. Additionally, you will need to arm yourself because various creatures will attack your base.

I am very grateful for any suggestions you share in the comment section.

Some systems are already complete that are not included in the currently published demo version, but I need to do some optimization before new version. So I would be grateful if you could describe the specifications you used to try it out.
